text: 🚨🇺🇦Europe, wach up! 🛢️Ukraine's gas storage sites are under attack by Kremlin missiles. 💥But why should you care? 🤔Well, Ukraine's storage facilities are bigger than any EU country & cover 28% of your needs! 💡Ukraine's energy infrastructure is at risk, and if Russia continues its attacks, there'll be serious doubts about its ability to face another winter. ❄️🌨️Stand with Ukraine, and let's not let the lights go out in Europe! 💪🏼🇪🇺
